languages.text: "Главным образом он действует как поддержка в бою. Обучен летальным и нелетальным способам захвата цели, способен оценивать обстановку и действовать соответствующе. Еще Глейто умеет вести слежку, распознавать элементарные улики. Он знает больше сотни команд и в целом..." {n}Соломон замолкает, задумчиво глядя на сидящего по струнке кибермастифа.{/n} "Он полезнее и исполнительнее большинства людей, которых я встречал".

"He mostly provides combat support. He is trained in both lethal and non-lethal ways of disabling a target, with the ability to analyse a situation and then decide on a course of action. Glaito is a good tracker too, and he can spot basic evidence. He also knows over a hundred commands. In general..." {n}Solomorne pauses, looking pensively at the cyber-mastiff sitting at attention.{/n} "He is more resourceful and diligent than most people I've met."

Еще Глейто умеет вести слежку, распознавать элементарные улики. Он знает больше сотни команд и в целом..." {n}Соломон замолкает, задумчиво глядя на сидящего по струнке кибермастифа.{/n} "Он полезнее и исполнительнее большинства людей, которых я встречал".

traits.locale_text: "He mostly provides combat support. He is trained in both lethal and non-lethal ways of disabling a target, he can analyse a situation and decide on a course of action. Glaito is also a good tracker and can spot basic evidence. He knows over a hundred commands, and, in general..." {n}Solomorne pauses, looking pensively at the cyber-mastiff sitting at attention.{/n} "He is more resourceful and diligent than most people I've met."

languages.text: 「主に戦闘支援を行います。致死性・非致死性の両面から対象を無力化する訓練を受けており、状況を分析したうえで最適な行動を選択する能力があります。グライトは追跡も得意で、簡単な証拠なら見つけることができます。また、100以上のコマンドも覚えています。総じて言えば…」{n}ソロモーンは考え込むように、姿勢を正して座るサイバーマスチフを見つめて一瞬言葉を止めた。{/n}「これまで会ってきた大半の人間よりも、彼のほうがよほど有能で勤勉です」
languages.original_text: "He mostly provides combat support. He is trained in both lethal and non-lethal ways of disabling a target, with the ability to analyse a situation and then decide on a course of action. Glaito is a good tracker too, and he can spot basic evidence. He also knows over a hundred commands. In general..." {n}Solomorne pauses, looking pensively at the cyber-mastiff sitting at attention.{/n} "He is more resourceful and diligent than most people I've met."

traits.locale_text: 「主に戦闘支援を行います。致死性・非致死性の両面から対象を無力化する訓練を受けており、状況を分析したうえで最適な行動を選択する能力があります。グライトは追跡も得意で、簡単な証拠なら見つけることができます。また、100以上のコマンドも覚えています。総じて言えば…」{n}ソロモーンは考え込むように、姿勢を正して座るサイバーマスチフを見つめて一瞬言葉を止めた。{/n}「これまで会ってきた大半の人間よりも、彼のほうがよほど有能で勤勉です」

languages.text: "Seine Hauptaufgabe ist Unterstützung im Kampf. Er kann Ziele tödlich und nicht-tödlich außer Gefecht setzen, indem er eine Situation analysiert und dann über das Vorgehen entscheidet. Außerdem kann Glaito sehr gut Spuren lesen und einfache Beweise finden. Er beherrscht über hundert Kommandos. Im Großen und Ganzen ..." {n}Solomorne hält inne und fixiert nachdenklich den Cyber-Mastiff, der aufmerksam vor ihm sitzt.{/n} "... ist er einfallsreicher und verlässlicher als die meisten Leute, die ich kenne."
languages.original_text: "He mostly provides combat support. He is trained in both lethal and non-lethal ways of disabling a target, with the ability to analyse a situation and then decide on a course of action. Glaito is a good tracker too, and he can spot basic evidence. He also knows over a hundred commands. In general..." {n}Solomorne pauses, looking pensively at the cyber-mastiff sitting at attention.{/n} "He is more resourceful and diligent than most people I've met."

Er kann Ziele tödlich und nicht-tödlich außer Gefecht setzen, indem er eine Situation analysiert und dann über das Vorgehen entscheidet. Außerdem kann Glaito sehr gut Spuren lesen und einfache Beweise finden. Er beherrscht über hundert Kommandos. Im Großen und Ganzen ..." {n}Solomorne hält inne und fixiert nachdenklich den Cyber-Mastiff, der aufmerksam vor ihm sitzt.{/n} "... ist er einfallsreicher und verlässlicher als die meisten Leute, die ich kenne."

languages.text: « Il sert essentiellement de soutien sur le champ de bataille. Il est dressé à neutraliser des cibles de manière létale ou non, tout en étant capable d'analyser une situation puis d'adapter ses actions en conséquence. C'est également un bon pisteur capable de repérer des preuves basiques. Il connaît également plus d'une centaine d'ordres. Globalement... » {n}Solomorne s'interrompt un instant, observant d'un air pensif le chien qui se tient à ses ordres, contre sa jambe.{/n} « Je pense qu'il est plus ingénieux et scrupuleux que la plupart des humains que j'ai pu croiser au cours de ma vie. »
languages.original_text: "He mostly provides combat support. He is trained in both lethal and non-lethal ways of disabling a target, with the ability to analyse a situation and then decide on a course of action. Glaito is a good tracker too, and he can spot basic evidence. He also knows over a hundred commands. In general..." {n}Solomorne pauses, looking pensively at the cyber-mastiff sitting at attention.{/n} "He is more resourceful and diligent than most people I've met."

traits.locale_text: « Il sert essentiellement de soutien sur le champ de bataille. Il est dressé à neutraliser des cibles de manière létale ou non, tout en étant capable d'analyser une situation puis d'adapter ses actions en conséquence. C'est également un bon pisteur capable de repérer des preuves basiques. Il connaît également plus d'une centaine d'ordres. Globalement... » {n}Solomorne s'interrompt un instant, observant d'un air pensif le chien qui se tient à ses ordres, contre sa jambe.{/n} « Je pense qu'il est plus ingénieux et scrupuleux que la plupart des humains que j'ai pu croiser au cours de ma vie. »

languages.text: «Sobre todo proporciona apoyo en combate. Ha sido adiestrado en métodos letales y no letales para neutralizar objetivos, con capacidad para analizar la situación y decidir el mejor modo de proceder. Glaito es buen rastreador y puede detectar pruebas básicas. También entiende y sabe cumplir más de un centenar de órdenes. En general...». {n}Solomorne hace una pausa, mirando pensativamente al cibermastín que aguarda en postura de alerta.{/n} «Es más ingenioso y diligente que la mayoría de las personas que conozco».
languages.original_text: "He mostly provides combat support. He is trained in both lethal and non-lethal ways of disabling a target, with the ability to analyse a situation and then decide on a course of action. Glaito is a good tracker too, and he can spot basic evidence. He also knows over a hundred commands. In general..." {n}Solomorne pauses, looking pensively at the cyber-mastiff sitting at attention.{/n} "He is more resourceful and diligent than most people I've met."

traits.locale_text: «Sobre todo proporciona apoyo en combate. Ha sido adiestrado en métodos letales y no letales para neutralizar objetivos, con capacidad para analizar la situación y decidir el mejor modo de proceder. Glaito es buen rastreador y puede detectar pruebas básicas. También entiende y sabe cumplir más de un centenar de órdenes. En general...». {n}Solomorne hace una pausa, mirando pensativamente al cibermastín que aguarda en postura de alerta.{/n} «Es más ingenioso y diligente que la mayoría de las personas que conozco».

languages.text: “它主要负责提供战斗支援。它接受过‘致命’与‘非致命’两种战斗方针的训练，可以通过不同方式让目标失去战斗能力。它知道如何分析局势，决定如何进行战斗。它非常擅长追踪，可以发现最隐秘的踪迹。除此之外，它还熟知一百多条命令。总之……”{n}索罗蒙顿了顿，若有所思地看着端坐在地上的格雷托。{/n}“这条狗比我见过的绝大部分人更聪明、更勤奋。”
languages.original_text: "He mostly provides combat support. He is trained in both lethal and non-lethal ways of disabling a target, with the ability to analyse a situation and then decide on a course of action. Glaito is a good tracker too, and he can spot basic evidence. He also knows over a hundred commands. In general..." {n}Solomorne pauses, looking pensively at the cyber-mastiff sitting at attention.{/n} "He is more resourceful and diligent than most people I've met."

traits.locale_text: “它主要负责提供战斗支援。它接受过‘致命’与‘非致命’两种战斗方针的训练，可以通过不同方式让目标失去战斗能力。它知道如何分析局势，决定如何进行战斗。它非常擅长追踪，可以发现最隐秘的踪迹。除此之外，它还熟知一百多条命令。总之……”{n}索罗蒙顿了顿，若有所思地看着端坐在地上的格雷托。{/n}“这条狗比我见过的绝大部分人更聪明、更勤奋。”

languages.text: "Çoğunlukla savaşta destek sağlar. Hem ölümcül olan hem de ölümcül olmayan hedef etkisizleştirme yöntemlerinde eğitilmiştir, durumu analiz edip bir eylem rotası çıkarma yeteneğine sahiptir. Glaito aynı zamanda iyi bir izcidir ve basit kanıtları tespit edebilir. Ayrıca yüzün üzerinde komut bilir. Genel olarak..." {n}Solomorne duraklıyor, hazırda oturan siber mastife düşünceli bir şekilde bakıyor.{/n} "Tanıştığım çoğu insandan daha becerikli ve gayretlidir."
languages.original_text: "He mostly provides combat support. He is trained in both lethal and non-lethal ways of disabling a target, with the ability to analyse a situation and then decide on a course of action. Glaito is a good tracker too, and he can spot basic evidence. He also knows over a hundred commands. In general..." {n}Solomorne pauses, looking pensively at the cyber-mastiff sitting at attention.{/n} "He is more resourceful and diligent than most people I've met."
